Articles.Content:
Love ya Harvey, here\'s some good press, for what its worth.

http://www.modinformer.net/2012/03/26/kerbal-space-program-modding/

regards,

the Salamander
Silisko Industries Crankiness Doughnut Research & Spacecraft Development
Just some friendly ribbing, we all know you\'re the best =P

Just some friendly ribbing, we all know you\'re the best =P

Damned inside jokes, I giggled tremendously when you said ribbing... =P

A bit of advice though, most of the packs you linked (excluding Down Under) are tremendously out of date - functional, at best.

So, if its an article about mods... you got some out of date ones listed there.

I don\'t think Skunky has touched the Pirate mod since I\'ve been playing KSP, and both SIDR and Wobbly are discontinued and a part of NovaPunch now. In fact slew\'s is the only current one on the list.

Definitely need to list C7, since its in the screenshot (with my silly Tiberdyne engine mount and engines :
You might want to present mods that display the technology capability of mods, such as MechJeb.

So, if its an article about mods... you got some out of date ones listed there.

I don\'t think Skunky has touched the Pirate mod since I\'ve been playing KSP, and both SIDR and Wobbly are discontinued and a part of NovaPunch now. In fact slew\'s is the only current one on the list.

Definitely need to list C7, since its in the screenshot (with my silly Tiberdyne engine mount and engines :

Really? Hmm. Well, I guess if anyone sees this and has a recent thread they want linked, a change is fairly easy.

I just looked through the index megathread and posted from there. Perhaps not the best resource.

And I will be sure and add C7.
Also it\'s not in 'Stable Beta' at all - it\'s still a fairly unstable alpha.

Also it\'s not in 'Stable Beta' at all - it\'s still a fairly unstable alpha.

Updated with this information and the more recent links to part packs.

Well Nova\'s new work certainly needs to be linked; lots of stuff here: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=6397.0

Here\'s the NovaPunch pack (an update of SIDR, Wobbly, and CaptainSlug\'s mods, plus some of my own additions) http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4180.0

KW Rocketry: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=2680.0

C7 spaceplanes: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=1172.0 (thats the new stuff, the original one is linked in the 1st post)

Mechjeb: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=8021.0

Cart plugin: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=8431.0

Shared-world Multiplayer: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=9344.0

I could go on and on.. lots of cool things if you browse the forums (things have been jumbled up a bit with the forum changes and are still settling)

That old index by Darkknox is out of date sadly, not sure how much in there is functional anymore.

Edit: the new ones you added are good, too.

*snip*

And thats just a few of the main ones.

I do wish there was a more comprehensive list out there...
